oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of wartime Nashville, the State Capitol and St. Mary's Church
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph bears 2-cent Internal Revenue stamp and was produced by "Hall's Gallery of Photography, Cor[ner] Cedar St. & Public Square, Nashville, Tenn." It belonged to Fletcher Kennard, who was in an Ohio regiment posted to Nashville he was hospitalized on the University of Nashville campus. View looking northwest of the new Tennessee State Capitol over Nashville rooftops and the steeple of St. Mary's Catholic Church. Wooden palisade & Union army tents are shown in rows on Capitol Hill.
